entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Pembroke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:01 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pembroke 10:00 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: NNE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow or rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and flurries changing to snow late this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets mixed with snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Ice pellets mixed with snow changing to snow near midnight. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of snow. High minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. High minus 4. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 5. Forecast issued 6:26 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
